channel.title: Need help with getting server online!
channel.description: I downloaded a source and client, got no-ip all ready, portforwarded, I put my server ip in client.java, then i compiled it and tried to run it and it said something was wrong with the gui. Please help!

item.title: Need help with getting server online!
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

To clear things up, this is a client-sided issue, not a server-sided issue.

GUI.class doesn’t exist, compile for it to exist and then run. You shouldn’t have modified your run.bat file to a server’s run.bat file…

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with getting server online!

item.title: Need help with getting server online!
item.dc:creator: @Hacked Hacked
item.description:
@Hacked wrote:

what i did was search this “68.67.79.75” an change to “127.0.0.1” then search “server” And just change to “127.0.0.1” an if you want others to play change it to your No-ip. Mistake me if im wrong. But this is what i did and mine Fully working.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with getting server online!

item.title: Need help with getting server online!
item.dc:creator: @T0xicsnip3r T0xicsnip3r
item.description:
@T0xicsnip3r wrote:

Dude u dont change the ip in gui!! make the ip in gui say 127.0.0.1 , then ip in client.java say 127.0.0.1 then make a copy of ur client for ur players to play , leave gui.java alone , go to client.java and change the ip in there to ur no-ip! only for ur players though , in ur client u most be connected to 127.0.0.1 for u to be able to get on.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with getting server online!
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

omg modz:

ok but now it says Could not find or load main class rs2.server.

@echo off title Running server.. "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

item.title: Need help with getting server online!
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

omg modz:

ok but can you send a link to a video or explain thoroughly how to do that, this is my first attempt at a rsps.

Try this run.bat

@echo off title Running Server.. java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; rs2.Server pause

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with getting server online!
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

omg modz:

could not find the main class: Gui. it says that still

Basically, you’re getting the error because your run.bat cannot find the GUI. You need to right click, edit, your run.bat so that it locates the directory where your GUI is.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with getting server online!

item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

Change your IP in gui.java:

sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(“YOURSERVERIPHERE”));
